name: 2022: City of Atrophy
description:
OVERVIEW:

In 2022: City of Atrophy, you play as a time traveler who is trying to fix their broken future by travelling to the past. To create the portals between the timelines, the player must collect enough pieces of the portals to create a full portal. Hopefully, somewhere in the timelines, they can find the key to bringing back their lively home.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Controls

  • Jump - Space Bar
  • Slide - Shift Key

Objective

  • Collect portal pieces to create portals
  • Run as far as you can

Note: Jumping out of a slide will result in a higher jump

CREDITS:
